name: Are we there yet? (itch) (AzathMan)
description:
This game is about riding your car with your son.  You encounter difficult events, like your radio playing, your son being annoying, and many more. Can you get through this ride?

Controls are :

W  - For Windshield

S - For your Son

D - To doge enemy Cars

M - For your broken Radio

This game was made for a Overnight  Jam  2
